user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, reliable underwear that provides full coverage and does not show under clothing.
purchase_reason: I purchased these because I wanted comfortable underwear that wouldn't show under my clothes. The breathable cotton and the no-show design were key features that appealed to me, as I prefer a relaxed fit without tight support. The emphasis on comfort and the practical aspects of the product were significant factors in my decision.

I chose these because I appreciate the combination of soft cotton and a comfortable fit. The full coverage and pinch-free design were important to me, as I wanted something that would stay in place and not cause any discomfort. The positive reviews and my previous experiences with similar products influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and quality. I value items that are well-made and provide a good fit, as evidenced by my positive experiences with socks, shoes, and clothing that emphasize comfort and support. I appreciate features like soft materials, good arch support, and breathable fabrics that enhance my overall experience. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not fit properly, especially those that run small or are uncomfortable to wear. I also find poor quality or lack of durability unappealing, as I prefer to invest in products that will last and provide good value for money.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, reliable underwear that provides full coverage and does not show under clothing. within my expected price range: [8.46, 10.47]
What specific size and color preferences do you have for the underwear you are looking for?
I prefer neutral colors like black, white, or nude for my underwear. In terms of size, I usually go for medium or large, depending on the brand's sizing chart.
What fabric material do you prefer for your underwear - cotton, microfiber, modal, or any other specific material?
I prefer cotton fabric for my underwear. It's breathable and comfortable, which aligns well with my general preference for soft materials that offer good fit and support.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Hipster Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0B15GQCC1 / Price: $9.29 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Start your day bright-eyed and cotton-bottomed with Fruit of the Loom®'s newly reinvented cotton hipsters. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We've used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These hipsters come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom® panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort. These hipsters feature a moderate rise with full seat coverage."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Signature Breathe Cotton Brief Underwear 6-Pack> / Item ID: B07PYB8F1G / Price: $10.47 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Hanes Signature Breathe Cotton Briefs deliver a no-show look under any outfit. Breathable, ring spun cotton is soft against your skin and features X-Temp cooling to help keep you feeling comfortable. The Signature Breathe Brief is nice if you desire full front, hip and seat coverage. Lay-flat waist and leg bands help minimize lines under clothes and are designed to stay in place for a no ride up fit. So grab your Signature Breathe Cotton Briefs; they're perfect for every day, all day comfort. Available in a 6-pack of assorted colors."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Girls' Tag Free Cotton Brief Underwear Multipacks> / Item ID: B09VPFJYVR / Price: $9.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Girls', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Panties'] / Description: ["Introducing our improved cotton with extra softness, Fruit of the Loom girls' 14 pack brief is an essential addition to her collection with this value pack size. This brief is designed with breathable, 100% cotton fabric, a plush, ravel-free waistband, and soft, fabric-covered legs. The waistband sits just below the belly button and has a lower cut leg for a more classic fit with mom approved coverage. This assortment includes fun prints and fashionable solids that are sure to become her new favorites. As always, our Fruit of the Loom panties are tag free and have a 100% cotton liner for extra softness. These briefs are not only cute, but the ultimate in comfort!"]
